praveenp@... wrote:

> Hi,
> I am new to Junit. I have just started getting to know Junit. Can any one
> tell me how to launch Junit?

Yes.  The Junit documentation.  RTFM.  Better yet, buy a copy of the 
book "Java Tools for Extreme Programming", which covers not only Junit, 
but Ant and other useful tools as well.

There are actually many ways to launch JUnit.  I usually run it from the 
Ant build tool, using the junit task.
